column2: UPDATE 1-Monitise explores strategic review
column3: warns on full-year results Jan 22 Monitise Plc
column4: a British mobile banking technology company
column5: said it was reviewing its strategic options and warned that full-year revenue would be below its expectations
column6: blaming its transition to a subscription-based business model.

column2: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-US fines Wells Fargo
column3: JPMorgan over "illegal mortgage kickbacks" WASHINGTON
column4: Jan 22 U.S. and state regulators ordered Wells Fargo and JPMorgan Chase to collectively pay $35.7 million on Thursday to settle charges that they participated in an illegal marketing kickback scheme with a now-defunct title company.
